column5: Sets the string that indicates a timestamp format.

column1: Sets the string that indicates a timestamp without timezone format.
Defines the maximum number of characters allowed for any given value being read. By default, it is -1 meaning unlimited length%2
column3: Infers the input schema automatically from data. It requires one extra pass over the data. CSV built-in functions ignore this option.

column1: Sets a separator for each field and value. This separator can be one or more characters.
